title: Edelweiss Housing Finance’s ₹300 crore NCD issue to offer up to 9.70% interest - Mint
content: Edelweiss Housing Finance’s ₹300 crore NCD issue to offer up to 9.70% interest  Mint
description: The NCDs proposed to be issued under this issue have been rated AA- with a negative outlook by Crisil Ltd and AA with a negative outlook by Acuite Ratings
